name: Bacteria Madness
description:
Computer Science Thesis Project 
Universidad Peruana de Ciencias Aplicadas
A Microbiology Adaptive Serious Game for medicine students to learn about bacteria  in a more entertaining environment.

Note: 
We consider that the student already had some previous knowledge of the subject

Available languages:
Español
English (Soon)
